Table.Name: messages
Table.Command: select Id, [From], [To], [Text], IsSent from [dbo].[messages] where Id=@messageId
select Id, [From], [To], [Text], IsSent from [dbo].[messages] where [To]=@recipient and IsSent = 0
update messages set isSent = 1 where Id = @id

Table.Name: events
Table.Command: select Id, [Type], [Description], Organizer, Subscriber, IsSent from [dbo].[events]
select Id, [Type], [Description], Organizer, Subscriber, IsSent from [dbo].[events] where Subscriber=@subscriber and IsSent = 0
update events set isSent = 1 where Id = @id

Table.Name: subscribers
Table.Command: if not exists (select 1 from subscribers where Subscriber = @subscriber and [Type] = @type) begin insert into subscribers values (@subscriber, @type) end
